Module org.microbean.bean
Package org.microbean.bean

Class DefaultBeanSet

java.lang.Object
org.microbean.bean.DefaultBeanSet
All Implemented Interfaces:
Constable, BeanSet
public class DefaultBeanSet extends Object implements BeanSet, Constable
A straightforward BeanSet implementation.
Author:
Laird Nelson

  • Constructor Details

    • DefaultBeanSet

      @Deprecated public DefaultBeanSet()
      Deprecated.
      This constructor is for very specialized use cases only. Please use one of the other constructors instead.
      Creates a new, essentially useless, DefaultBeanSet.

      Using this constructor will result in a DefaultBeanSet that contains only self-referential Beans. It is probably useful only for proxying purposes.

      See Also:
      • DefaultBeanSet(Assignability, Collection, Map, Resolver)

    • DefaultBeanSet

      public DefaultBeanSet(Collection<? extends Bean<?>> beans)
      Creates a new DefaultBeanSet.
      Parameters:
      beans - a Collection of Beans; may be null; no reference to this object is retained
      See Also:
      • DefaultBeanSet(Assignability, Collection, Map, Resolver)

    • DefaultBeanSet

      public DefaultBeanSet(Assignability assignability, Collection<? extends Bean<?>> beans)
      Creates a new DefaultBeanSet.
      Parameters:
      assignability - an Assignability; may be null in which case a default one will be used
      beans - a Collection of Beans; may be null; no reference to this object is retained
      See Also:
      • DefaultBeanSet(Assignability, Collection, Map, Resolver)

    • DefaultBeanSet

      public DefaultBeanSet(Assignability assignability, Collection<? extends Bean<?>> beans, Map<? extends BeanSelectionCriteria,? extends Bean<?>> preCalculatedResolutions, Alternate.Resolver resolver)
      Creates a new DefaultBeanSet.
      Parameters:
      assignability - an Assignability; may be null in which case a default one will be used
      beans - a Collection of Beans; may be null; no reference to this object is retained
      preCalculatedResolutions - a Map of BeanSelectionCriteria to Beans representing already-resolved Beans; may be null; no reference to this object is retained
      resolver - a Alternate.Resolver; may be null in which case a default one will be used
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if preCalculatedResolutions contains any BeanSelectionCriteria that does not select its corresponding Bean

  • Method Details

    • bean

      public final Bean<?> bean(BeanSelectionCriteria beanSelectionCriteria)
      Description copied from interface: BeanSet
      Returns the sole Bean selected by the supplied beanSelectionCriteria, or null if there is no such Bean.

      If there is more than one Bean selected by the supplied beanSelectionCriteria, then an AmbiguousResolutionException is thrown.

      Specified by:
      bean in interface BeanSet
      Parameters:
      beanSelectionCriteria - a BeanSelectionCriteria; must not be null
      Returns:
      the resolved Bean, or null

    • bean

      public final Bean<?> bean(BeanSelectionCriteria beanSelectionCriteria, BiFunction<? super BeanSelectionCriteria,? super Collection<? extends Bean<?>>,? extends Bean<?>> op)
      Description copied from interface: BeanSet
      Returns the sole Bean selected by the supplied beanSelectionCriteria, or null if there is no such Bean.

      If there is more than one Bean selected by the supplied beanSelectionCriteria, then the supplied BiFunction is invoked with the supplied beanSelectionCriteria and the selected Beans and its result is returned.

      Specified by:
      bean in interface BeanSet
      Parameters:
      beanSelectionCriteria - a BeanSelectionCriteria; must not be null
      op - a disambiguating BiFunction that can further resolve a Collection of Beans to a single Bean; must not be null
      Returns:
      the resolved Bean, or null

    • beans

      public final SequencedSet<Bean<?>> beans()
      Description copied from interface: BeanSet
      Returns an entirely immutable SequencedSet of Beans containing all Beans known to this BeanSet implementation.
      Specified by:
      beans in interface BeanSet
      Returns:
      an entirely immutable SequencedSet of Beans containing all Beans known to this BeanSet implementation; never null

    • beans

      public final SequencedSet<Bean<?>> beans(BeanSelectionCriteria beanSelectionCriteria)
      Description copied from interface: BeanSet
      Returns an entirely immutable SequencedSet of Beans selected by the supplied beanSelectionCriteria.
      Specified by:
      beans in interface BeanSet
      Parameters:
      beanSelectionCriteria - a BeanSelectionCriteria; must not be null
      Returns:
      an entirely immutable SequencedSet of Beans selected by the supplied beanSelectionCriteria; never null
